decorations.englishDescription: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.) Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.
decorations.chineseDescription: 增加水屬性攻擊力。（屬性攻擊力有上限。）在完美時機防禦後暫時提高攻擊力。

skillName.chinese: 水屬性攻擊強化 / 攻擊防禦

decorations.englishDescription: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.) Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.
decorations.chineseDescription: 增加水屬性攻擊力。（屬性攻擊力有上限。）延長武器的銳利度量表。但不會使量表超過其最大值。

skillName.chinese: 水屬性攻擊強化 / 匠

decorations.englishDescription: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.) Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.
decorations.chineseDescription: 增加水屬性攻擊力。（屬性攻擊力有上限。）減少防禦時的後座力和體力消耗。

skillName.chinese: 水屬性攻擊強化 / 防禦

decorations.englishDescription: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.) Makes it easier to stun monsters.
decorations.chineseDescription: 增加水屬性攻擊力。（屬性攻擊力有上限。）更容易使怪物陷入眩暈狀態。

skillName.chinese: 水屬性攻擊強化 / 氣絕術

decorations.englishDescription: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.) Increases the bowgun's reload speed and increases the power of bullets when fully loaded.
decorations.chineseDescription: 增加水屬性攻擊力。（屬性攻擊力有上限。）提高弩槍的裝填速度並在彈倉充滿時增加子彈威力。

skillName.chinese: 水屬性攻擊強化 / 開場強化

decorations.englishDescription: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.) Extends the range in which ammo and arrows have maximum power.
decorations.chineseDescription: 增加水屬性攻擊力。（屬性攻擊力有上限。）延長彈藥和箭矢發揮最大威力的距離範圍。

skillName.chinese: 水屬性攻擊強化 / 彈道學

decorations.englishDescription: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.) Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades.
decorations.chineseDescription: 增加水屬性攻擊力。（屬性攻擊力有上限。）提高斬擊斧和充能斧的變形速度和威力。

skillName.chinese: 水屬性攻擊強化 / 高速變形

decorations.englishDescription: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.) Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness.
decorations.chineseDescription: 增加水屬性攻擊力。（屬性攻擊力有上限。）防止你的武器失去銳利度。

skillName.chinese: 水屬性攻擊強化 / 利刃

decorations.englishDescription: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.) Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.
decorations.chineseDescription: 增加水屬性攻擊力。（屬性攻擊力有上限。）使你能夠防禦通常無法格擋的攻擊。

skillName.chinese: 水屬性攻擊強化 / 防禦強化
